name: BKwai
slogan: Data for smarter cities and construction
description: Software platform provides data insights for construction and city infrastructure condition. Leveraging different data sources with AI and structural engineering wisdom results in the next generation product for preventative maintenance of the built environment.

team.name: Niv Magen
team.bioHtml: CTO * Co-Founder @BKwai

team.title: CTO & Co-Founder
team.name: Niv Magen
team.bioHtml: CTO * Co-Founder @BKwai

jobs.title: Full Stack Web Developer
jobs.description:
BKwai has a vision to deliver smarter, safer more resilient cities. We're on the start of this journey and developing a next generation data analytics platform for the construction industry, saving costs and detecting failures throughout the lifetime of mega infrastructure projects.

We're a VC-backed early stage startup and have paying customers. Our founders are second-time succesful entrepreneurs, embedded in the construction industry, and have over 25 years of combined experience. We are growing rapidly and  looking for talented individuals to join us on a mission to disrupt and revolutionise an outdated industry.

We integrate sensor, satellite and environmental data, using AI to provide insights and risk assessment, looking for a bright and ambitious full-stack web developer, with passion about Front End architecture and design. You’ll lead the development of the Front End, work closely with our clients, and have the opportunity to grow with us and build incredible products.

**Key technical requirements**
* 3+ years of experience on SaaS applications 
* Demonstrable experience in web development with React/ Vue.js, CSS, JavaScript
* Proficiency with Python frameworks like Django/Flask.
* Understanding of best practices in the web development industry.
* SQL/ NoSQL databases experience
* Linux Systems Administration
* AWS experience - advantage
* Data analytics visualization experience - advantage
* UX/UI design experience - advantage

**Other useful skills**
* Interest in machine learning and artificial intelligence
* 3D Software (e.g. Blender) for advanced visualisations
* Experience with remote working in an agile environment

**Ideal candidate skills profile**
* Clear communicator who is able to translate and collaborate across the tech and
construction sectors
* Organised and self-motivated with an ability to manage their workload and drive
progress forward
* Able to begin role using remote working but willing to join team within the office and
contribute to the culture of the company

**Why join us?**
We're at the start of our journey and this role has the chance to make an impact - both on the culture and growth of the company, as well as in shaping safer more resilient cities and urban environments. We offer:
* Flexible working
* A diverse and balanced team
* The opportunity to work with industry and leading academics - from construction sites to prestigious university collaborations - there's always something new!
* We're looking to shape the culture and benefits for working with us, so happy to hear what you think
